channel.title: The Blind Bridges Podcast
channel.description: Welcome to the Blind Bridges Podcast! The goal of this podcast is to teach people useful skills to help them become more independent at home or in the workplace, be them disabled or otherwise.
channel.itunes:author: Blind Bridges Informational Exchange Group
channel.itunes:summary: Welcome to the Blind Bridges Podcast! The goal of this podcast is to teach people useful skills to help them become more independent at home or in the workplace, be them disabled or otherwise.
channel.itunes:subtitle: Blind Bridges Podcast
channel.itunes:keywords: blind bridges, blind bridges podcast, the blind bridges podcast, blind, bridges, podcast

item.title: Blind Bridges Podcast Episode 2, The Joys of Moving
item.description: In this episode, Firecat shows you how to pack boxes, as well as other things related to moving to a new home.
item.itunes:keywords: the joys of moving, joys of moving, joys, moving
item.itunes:subtitle: The Joys of Moving

item.title: Blind Bridges Podcast Short 1, Operating a Cooks Essentials Air-fryer
item.description: In this short podcast, Garrett gives a rundown of his air-fryer and how to use it.
item.itunes:keywords: operating a cooks essentials air-fryer, operating a cooks essentials air fryer, operating an air-fryer, operating an air fryer, air-fryer, air fryer, fryer, cooks essentials, operating cooks essentials air-fryer, opperating cooks essentials air fryer, operating air-fryer, operating air fryer
item.itunes:subtitle: Operating a Cooks Essentials Air-fryer

item.title: Blind Bridges Podcast Episode 1, Changing a Wall Outlet
item.description: In this episode, Firecat takes you through removing an old wall outlet and putting in a new one.
item.itunes:keywords: changing a wall outlet, wall outlet, wall, outlet, changing wall outlet
item.itunes:subtitle: Changing a Wall Outlet
